sourcesContent:
/* To calculate the result we will be using call math.evaluate where we can pass in a string to get a result install npm install mathjs */ import React from 'react' import { useState } from "react"; import { evaluate } from "mathjs"; function SinglePageCalculator() { const [expression, setExpression] = useState(222); // Set default or empty const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setExpression((ex) => evaluate(ex)); }; return (
{expression}
) } export default SinglePageCalculator
